question: Read the following and find the correct about ECO Niwas Samhita. 1.It was launched to increase energy efficiency in residential sector. 2.Ministry of Home Affairs launched the ECO Niwas Samhita 2018.
explanation: Ministry of Power launched the ECO Niwas Samhita on December 2018 to increase efficiency in residential sector. The Code was launched on the occasion of National Energy Conservation Day 2018.
